item.description:
Sorry for the late update. It snuck up on me this month. I missed last months meetup on account of a car accident that morning. (I'm fine, the car: not so much.) So this time I really will bring my laptop in case anyone has any follow up questions from September's Rails presentation, or in case anyone who missed it wants to see a quick demo.

We'll meet at the CAV in the old Jewelery District again, around the corner from Gerry's Art Warehouse. Here's the URL: CAV. There's parking in the lot across the street.

group.name: Providence Web Development Lunch Hour Meetup Group

item.name: Providence Web Development Lunch Hour November Meetup
